divs: Sighting DetailsI went out side for a smoke I had been there for mabybe 5 minutes when I just happen to look up and see it appear it resembled a star or the International space station when it flies over. It moved to the north west with side to side manuvers. It was way too slow for a meteor. It disappeared over the horizon.
Summary: appeared from nowhere and moved to the nothwest. High altitude
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dalton
There were no other sightings in Dalton on or around April 30th 2010
